bibl.title: C.H. Roberts and H.E. Bell, The Oxyrhynchus Papyri. Part XIX (Nos 2208-2244). (Egypt Exploration Society. Graeco-Roman Memoirs.)
bibl.seg: Lobel E., E.P. Wegener, C.H. Roberts and H.E. Bell, The Oxyrhynchus Papyri. Part XIX (Nos 2208-2244). (Egypt Exploration Society. Graeco-Roman Memoirs.)
London, Egypt Exploration Society, 1948, 8°, xv-180 pp. et XIII pll.

C.R. par E.A. Barber, CR N.S., 1 (1951) pp. 80-82. - Aristide Calderini, Aegyptus 28 (1948) pp. 221-222. - Christopher M. Dawson, AJP 73 (1952) pp. 99-105. - Édouard des Places, Orientalia N.S., 19 (1950) p. 488. - Carlo Gallavotti, PP 4 (1949) fasc. 12, pp. 286-289. - Claire Préaux, ChrEg 24 (1949) No. 48, pp. 343-347. - Eric G. Turner, JHS 69 (1949) p. 77.
